TopicTitle: Each "+x.x (Science Transmission)" locks up the game for a couple of seconds

Articles.Content:
It's obviously a stock issue because I have read / written about that in several science mod's threads the last weeks and this behaviour cannot be fixed by mods.

It's just the stock message that floats over the screen, usually originating from the part which was the source of the transmission.

As soon as this occurs, the game locks up for up to 3 seconds.

I guess it would be a huge improvement, if this activity just happens without that kind of a long game stop.
[x] Science is known to cause a similar freeze.  Does your freeze happen when [x] science isn't installed? Can you reproduce this in a vanilla game?
Support issue moved to Support. And it's modded support because their mere presence can contribute, so that is a factor in diagnosis and remedy.
